page.title: 14HIS MAJESTY'S THEATRE
page.content: As you look at this magnificent builing you see the beautiful granite sparkle.It stands at the end of two builings,Aberdeen Public Library and St Marks Church.The three buildings are known locall as Education, Salvation and Damnation!In 1982 the theatre was renovated.Inside the theatre one marvels at the spledour of the walls and pillars wih red and gold everywhere.A huge crystal chandilier hangs from the ceilling and there is a lovely carving called"The Muses" above the stage.There is a large green dome at the top of the theatre which holds a vast volume of water.The reason for this is that during renovation the sanitory inspector said that all the toilets must flush simultaneously.The dome was the only place they could store such a volume of water.
